main event: A UFO was sighted with a bright blinking light moving from northeast to southwest at tremendous speed, and the light suddenly disappeared.
interesting points: The object was reported to have moved at tremendous speed before it vanished,The sighting was conducted using a theodolite for measurement,The light changed colors from green to red and then turned black,The observer noted that the visibility was excellent at the time of the sighting,No photographs were included in the report.
